synopsis.text: Set during the battle in Barato, the story focuses on the escalating conflict between the ambitious Umakichi gang and the established Hidoro gang over control of the city. As tensions rise, even the pregnant lover of the Hidoro boss and her secret lover get caught up in the dispute. Meanwhile, having heard rumors that the Hidoro gang possesses a valuable tattooed skin holding a clue to the hidden Ainu gold, Toshizou Hijikata and Hyakunosuke Ogata race to Barato. They end up on opposing sides - Hijikata joining forces with the Hidoros, and Ogata allying with Umakichi. As the two factions clash, betrayals unfold that make both sides reconsider hastily jumping into the fray. With the coveted skin up for grabs, the ensuing gang war becomes a scramble to secure a vital piece of the treasure map and determine the future of Barato.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
